scripts.build:happ: npm run build:wasm && bash scripts/pack-happ.sh && bash scripts/ts-bindings.sh
scripts.build:all: npm run clean:hc & npm run build:happ
scripts.devtest: npm run build:all && npm run start:mem
scripts.start:happ:mem: RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s --piped -f=$HC_ADMIN_PORT generate ./artifacts/playground.happ --run=$HC_APP_PORT -a playground network mem
scripts.start:mem: UI_PORT=$(port) HC_APP_PORT=$(port) HC_ADMIN_PORT=$(port) HAPP_BUILD_MODE='Debug' concurrently "npm run start:happ:mem" "sleep 5 && npm run start:ui -w playground/webapp"
